alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 09 at 10:03AM PDT until May 10 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minimum temperatures of 32 to 36 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Some areas inland from the coast in Coos, Curry, and Douglas counties including Camas Valley, Glendale, Drain, Curtain, and Yoncalla. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could damage or kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Partial clearing is expected across this area tonight into Tuesday morning resulting in some areas of frost. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
